title: How Much are PS5, Series X Games Gonna Cost? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.02.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about all the shocking news from NBA 2K21 and what it means for games going forward! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:05:40 - Housekeeping
Samurai Predator streams! Today and tomorrow! 3-5! twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Kinda Funny First Impressions of Hyper Scape is going up on Youtube after KFGD
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:50 - NBA 2K21 Prices Stun Everyone, Nick Summers Engadget
00:32:00 - Iron Man VR Review Round-up
00:41:00 - Microsoft Renews Fable Trademark, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:44:30 - Sony Buying Leyou? (They Own Splash Damage (most recently Gears Tactics) and Digital Extremes (Warframe)), Bloomberg
00:47:50 - Breaking Bad's Giancarlo Esposito Is In a Game, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:50:33 - There’s a Madden NFL 21 Uprising
00:52:00 - Fallout TV Show?
00:57:50 - Out today
00:58:20 - Do you feel like the XBox Summer Game Fest a good way to handle these demos with no live events? Do you think we will get demos for Halo Infinite or other big triple A games?- BJ Bernardo
 - Squad Up:LEXI PENCE - http://kindafunny.com/coffee
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Greg
